messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
On Farragut. I'm following a vehicle northbound passing Bowman.
Can you describe the vehicle?
It's a black sedan. The driver might be Sergio Munoz.
Do you know if the driver is armed?
Yes, the driver has a shotgun and just fired shots out the window.
Where are you now?
We're going eastbound on Langley. The vehicle is making a U-turn and we're now heading southbound on Gateway.
Stay on the line. I'm dispatching units to your location. Are there any other occupants in the vehicle?
There are two people in the trunk of the vehicle.
Police are on their way. Please keep providing updates on your location.
We're now southbound on 395. The driver just fired at another car.
Did anyone get hurt?
It seems like the civilians are fine, but the car was hit.
Units are approaching your location. Keep a safe distance and do not engage with the suspect.
I will. We're passing Silver Ridge, heading towards Gateway Elementary School.
Understood. Units are moving to intercept. Is the suspect vehicle still moving southbound?
Yes, the driver appears to be reaching for something in the back seat now.
Police are informed. Keep your distance and stay safe.
He's made a U-turn again and is going southbound on Langley.
Noted, additional units are being dispatched to your area. Are you able to continue following safely?
For now, yes. We're approaching China Lake. He's driving erratically.
Be very cautious. We're coordinating with other agencies to get more units to your location. Is the driver still armed?
He appears to be. Just fired again at another car. It's chaos here.
Stay safe and keep updating us on your location. Additional units and a K-9 are being dispatched.
We're now southbound on 395 passing Garlock. Speed is about 60 mph.
Understood, continue to stay back. Units should be intercepting soon.
He just fired multiple shots at passing vehicles. He's slowing down now.
Units are closing in. Be extremely careful. We'll get through this.
Vehicle is stopping. The driver is on the phone.
Maintain your distance. Police are almost there and they will handle the suspect.
